== Tirur (M) (803271) ==

Tirur (M) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 16.55 sq. km. and harbouring 10559 households with total population of 56058 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 26 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 373 km. Male population is 26308 and female population is 29750. Scheduled Caste population is 2717 and Scheduled Tribes population is 128. Census Location Code of the town is 803271<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 26 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 51 km. Railway station is at Tirur at a distance of 0 km.
